items.title: Celtic face sixth-tier Auchinleck Talbot in Scottish Cup
items.summary: Last season's beaten Scottish Cup finalists Celtic are drawn away to West of Scotland League Premier Division side Auchinleck Talbot in the fourth round, while defending champions Aberdeen start their defence at home against Championship side Raith Rovers.

items.title: 10-man Chelsea hold Arsenal to draw in feisty London derby
items.summary: Chelsea produce a defiant performance to hold Premier League leaders Arsenal to a 1-1 draw at Stamford Bridge after going down to 10 men following Moises Caicedo's first-half dismissal.

items.title: Liverpool put end to losing run with win against West Ham
items.summary: Alexander Isak scores his first Premier League goal for Liverpool as Arne Slot's side end their losing run with a 2-0 win away at West Ham.

items.title: Zirkzee and Mount help Man Utd secure comeback victory at Palace
items.summary: Joshua Zirkzee breaks his 12-month Premier League goal drought before Mason Mount fires in from a well worked free-kick as Manchester United secure a second-half comeback victory against Crystal Palace.

items.title: Brighton beat Nottingham Forest to go fifth in the table
items.summary: Brighton beat Nottingham Forest 2-0 with goals from Maxim De Cuyper and Stefanos Tzimas to go fifth in the Premier League table.
